member.name: AppPolicyMediaFoundationCodecLoading
member.summary: The AppPolicyMediaFoundationCodecLoading enumeration indicates whether a process’s policy allows it to load non-Windows (third-party) plugins.

member.name: AppPolicyMediaFoundationCodecLoading.AppPolicyMediaFoundationCodecLoading_All
member.summary: Indicates that the process’s policy allows it to load non-Windows (third-party) plugins.

member.name: AppPolicyMediaFoundationCodecLoading.AppPolicyMediaFoundationCodecLoading_InboxOnly
member.summary: Indicates that the process’s policy does not allow it to load non-Windows (third-party) plugins.
